CUDA Reference
==================

Documentation
---------------

* http://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/
* https://developer.nvidia.com/cuda-toolkit


Other
----------


* http://graphics.im.ntu.edu.tw/~bossliaw/nvCuda_doxygen/html/group___c_u_d_a_r_t___d_r_i_v_e_r.html

  * an unusually readable (for Doxygen) set of pages

Courses
----------

* http://istar.cse.cuhk.edu.hk/icuda/


Tools
------

::

    lspci | grep nVidia
    01:00.0 VGA compatible controller: nVidia Corporation GT200 [GTX260-216] (rev a1)
    06:00.0 3D controller: nVidia Corporation GT200 [Tesla C1060 / Tesla S1070] (rev a1)



Related Projects
------------------


* http://www.rcuda.net/

  * Remote CUDA

* MCUDA http://impact.crhc.illinois.edu/mcuda.aspx

  * CUDA on CPU
